events.name: EV battery supply chain transformation
events.wd_description: The coronavirus pandemic has accelerated the development of the lithium-ion-battery-to-electric-vehicle supply chain, intensifying a global battery arms race between China, the US, and Europe.
events.description: The coronavirus pandemic has accelerated the development of the lithium-ion-battery-to-electric-vehicle supply chain, intensifying a global battery arms race between China, the US, and Europe.

events.name: Battery megafactories
events.wd_description: The number of battery megafactories in the pipeline has significantly increased, with China leading the initiative to build battery capacity at speed and scale.
events.description: The number of battery megafactories in the pipeline has significantly increased, with China leading the initiative to build battery capacity at speed and scale.

events.name: Global battery arms race
events.wd_description: The competition among China, the US, and Europe to dominate the battery production industry, with the US currently lagging behind.
events.description: The competition among China, the US, and Europe to dominate the battery production industry, with the US currently lagging behind.

events.name: Active megafactories
events.wd_description: Out of 181 planned battery megafactories, 88 are currently active and producing cells for EVs.
events.description: Out of 181 planned battery megafactories, 88 are currently active and producing cells for EVs.

events.name: Raw materials and manufacturing quality
events.wd_description: The quality of raw materials, cathode, and anode manufacturing determines the performance of lithium-ion batteries and, subsequently, the EVs that use them.
events.description: The quality of raw materials, cathode, and anode manufacturing determines the performance of lithium-ion batteries and, subsequently, the EVs that use them.

events.name: Raw materials
events.wd_description: The quality of raw materials used in battery production is crucial for the performance of the final product.
events.description: The quality of raw materials used in battery production is crucial for the performance of the final product.

events.name: Cathode manufacturing
events.wd_description: High-quality cathode manufacturing is essential for producing efficient and reliable lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: High-quality cathode manufacturing is essential for producing efficient and reliable lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Anode manufacturing
events.wd_description: The production of high-quality anodes is critical for the overall performance of lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: The production of high-quality anodes is critical for the overall performance of lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Automaker evolution
events.wd_description: Traditional automakers are transforming into battery pack manufacturers and software engineers, forming closer relationships with battery cell makers.
events.description: Traditional automakers are transforming into battery pack manufacturers and software engineers, forming closer relationships with battery cell makers.

events.name: VW Group and Northvolt
events.wd_description: VW Group is partnering with Northvolt to strengthen their position in the battery supply chain.
events.description: VW Group is partnering with Northvolt to strengthen their position in the battery supply chain.

events.name: General Motors and LG Chem
events.wd_description: General Motors and LG Chem have jointly created a battery plant in Ohio to boost their EV production capabilities.
events.description: General Motors and LG Chem have jointly created a battery plant in Ohio to boost their EV production capabilities.

events.name: Supply chain asset ownership
events.wd_description: Understanding the importance of asset ownership along the supply chain is crucial for automakers' success in the next decade.
events.description: Understanding the importance of asset ownership along the supply chain is crucial for automakers' success in the next decade.

events.name: Investment in assets
events.wd_description: Automakers need to actively invest in and own assets throughout the supply chain to secure their future position.
events.description: Automakers need to actively invest in and own assets throughout the supply chain to secure their future position.

events.name: Intellectual property control
events.wd_description: Controlling intellectual property along the supply chain will provide a competitive edge to automakers.
events.description: Controlling intellectual property along the supply chain will provide a competitive edge to automakers.

events.name: Government involvement
events.wd_description: Governments have opportunities to create jobs and influence the strategic battery industry through policy and investment.
events.description: Governments have opportunities to create jobs and influence the strategic battery industry through policy and investment.

events.name: Job creation
events.wd_description: Governments can generate employment opportunities through investment in the battery supply chain.
events.description: Governments can generate employment opportunities through investment in the battery supply chain.

events.name: New trading relationships
events.wd_description: The shift in supply chain economics offers opportunities for new trading relationships, especially between Europe and the US.
events.description: The shift in supply chain economics offers opportunities for new trading relationships, especially between Europe and the US.

events.name: Global battery arms race
events.description: A competition primarily between China, the US, and Europe to build battery capacity.

events.name: Active megafactories
events.description: Of the 181 planned battery megafactories, 88 are currently active.

events.name: Tier 1 quality cells
events.description: High-specification EVs require Tier 1 quality cells, currently produced by companies like CATL, Tesla-Panasonic, Samsung SDI, LG Chem, SK Innovation, and Envision AESC.

events.name: Joint ventures
events.description: Examples include VW Group and Northvolt, and General Motors and LG Chem's joint battery plant in Ohio.

events.name: Importance of asset ownership
events.description: Future success depends on investing in and owning assets and controlling intellectual property along the supply chain
